body_html: Looks great! As for the tests - it seems that the ordering of ops in backward pass is not deterministic (https://travis-ci.org/pytorch/pytorch/jobs/299841429). It's not related to this diff, but @zdevito and @ezyang might be interested in figuring out a better way to unittest graphs.

body: Looks great! As for the tests - it seems that the ordering of ops in backward pass is not deterministic (https://travis-ci.org/pytorch/pytorch/jobs/299841429). It's not related to this diff, but @zdevito and @ezyang might be interested in figuring out a better way to unittest graphs.
